mainboard.name: Kalastria Highborn
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Mesmeric Fiend
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Bolas's Citadel
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

mainboard.name: Viscera Seer
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

mainboard.name: Adanto Vanguard
mainboard.oracle_text:
As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0.
Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Vampire of the Dire Moon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

mainboard.name: Meadowboon
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

mainboard.name: Resolute Reinforcements
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When Resolute Reinforcements enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

mainboard.name: Woodland Cemetery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

mainboard.name: Hallowed Fountain
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

mainboard.name: Undercity Sewers
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Undercity Sewers enters the battlefield tapped.
When Undercity Sewers enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Unearth
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainboard.name: Soul Warden
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Welcoming Vampire
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more other creatures with power 2 or less enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

mainboard.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

mainboard.name: Throne of the God-Pharaoh
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.

mainboard.name: Puppeteer Clique
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

mainboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Takenuma, Abandoned Mire
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {B}.
Channel — {3}{B}, Discard Takenuma, Abandoned Mire: Mill three cards, then return a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

mainboard.name: Agonizing Remorse
mainboard.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

mainboard.name: Feat of Resistance
mainboard.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)

mainboard.name: Field of Ruin
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

mainboard.name: Isolated Chapel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Flickerwisp
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

mainboard.name: Legion's Landing // Adanto, the First Fort
Kor Sanctifiers
mainboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainboard.name: Goldenglow Moth
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.

mainboard.name: Restless Fortress
mainboard.oracle_text:
Restless Fortress enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{2}{W}{B}: Restless Fortress becomes a 1/4 white and black Nightmare creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
Whenever Restless Fortress attacks, defending player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Fearless Fledgling
mainboard.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Fledgling. It gains flying until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Shadowy Backstreet
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
Shadowy Backstreet enters the battlefield tapped.
When Shadowy Backstreet enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

sideboard.name: Chart a Course
sideboard.oracle_text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

sideboard.name: Ghostly Flicker
sideboard.oracle_text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

sideboard.name: Spellstutter Sprite
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with mana value X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

sideboard.name: Breeding Pool
sideboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

sideboard.name: Malfegor
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

sideboard.name: Anje's Ravager
sideboard.oracle_text:
Anje's Ravager attacks each combat if able.
Whenever Anje's Ravager attacks, discard your hand, then draw three cards.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

sideboard.name: Grim Initiate
sideboard.oracle_text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

sideboard.name: Kor Skyfisher
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

sideboard.name: Cunning Lethemancer
sideboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.

sideboard.name: Ruthless Sniper
sideboard.oracle_text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

sideboard.name: Raven's Crime
sideboard.oracle_text:
Target player discards a card.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

sideboard.name: Intangible Virtue
sideboard.oracle_text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
